definition: to show off one's good looks shamelessly
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Have you ever got the experience of "showing-off"?
Whisper you: Your mum likes butiful dresses dreadfully .
sentences.chinese: 悄悄告訴你，媽媽很愛臭美。

sentences.english: Have you ever got the experience of “beauty”?
Joann thinks she owns the world. She's a real bitch.
sentences.chinese: 喬安認爲整個世界都是她的，真是臭美。

sentences.english: Our boss looked like the cat that ate the canary.
sentences.chinese: 我們老闆看起來很臭美。

sentences.english: I have a cousin, and she loves smug.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個表姐，她很愛臭美。

sentences.english: But I know that the girls definitely love smug myself, hey, me too.
sentences.chinese: 不過我知道，女孩子肯定愛臭美嘍，嘿嘿，我也是。

definition: to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
love of beauty/wishing to appear beautiful/to set store by one's appearance
to act cute/putting on adorable airs/to pretend to be lovely
ugly people will do all kinds of weird things to get attention (idiom)
to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
to be smitten with sb/love-struck fool/starry-eyed infatuation
